questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a group
Which of the following is not a characteristic of a finite field?

answers.a: The number of elements is finite.
answers.c: Multiplication has an inverse for every non-zero element.
answers.d: Division is well-defined for every pair of elements.

questions.question: How many irreducible polynomials of degree 2 are there over GF(16)?
What is the inverse of the element x = alpha^2 + alpha + 1 in GF(16)?
What is the order of the element alpha in GF(16), where alpha is a root of the irreducible polynomial x^4 + x + 1?
